A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are many movies that could have been so much better if only they allowed a longer run time\, movies that I would have loved to sit still for for 3 hours or more. \nThis movie did not need the extra time to tell the story\, and I did not enjoy sitting still for 2 1/2 hrs to get to see it unfold. The main characters seem actually less compelling than in the last movie\, as they: Turn Poe into an misogynistic ass-hat in order to make the slow-chase less boring\, give Finn \"something to do\" with a new character because his part in the story was over before the last movie ended\, and struggle to keep us interested in two lack-luster foils. I've tried but I just can't genuinely care about what happens to these characters the way I could for episodes 4-6.
